overview: Alice is a descendant of Martha Carrier, a woman hanged for witchcraft during the Salem Witch Trials. Her research for an upcoming book leads her to work with Brooklyn-based feminist guru Silvia Federici and to trace the history of the great witch hunts to todayâ€™s continuing patriarchal power grabs. A captivating story at a crossroads where past collides with present.
title: A Witch Story
